item.title: No debuging needed
item.dc:creator: @jr_pwn jr pwn
item.description:
@jr_pwn wrote:

ok heres my problem im trying to make my mith rock work and heres the code i wrote for it

case 2102: //jr pwn case 2103: //mithril rock if(actionTimer == 0 && (HasItemAmount(1275, 1))) { setAnimation(625); sendMessage("you mine some mith Ore"); actionTimer = 25; addItem(447, 1); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[14]), 14); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("You do not have a rune axe!"); } break;

now i think that code looks reasonable so i tryed compileing and running no errors and server started. so i went over had a rune axe in my inv and clicked the rock nothing happend. so i dropped the rune pick axe and tried it still nothing what did i do wrong?

Read full topic
